li.xpath: /Defs/ThingDef[( starts-with(@Name,'OG_Imperial_') or starts-with(@Name,'OG_Militarum_') or starts-with(@Name,'OG_Mechanicus_') or starts-with(@Name,'OG_Sororitas_') or starts-with(@Name,'OG_Astartes_') or starts-with(@Name,'OG_Chaos_')) and (contains(@Name, 'Apparel_Makeable') or contains(@Name, 'Armor_Makeable') or contains(@Name, 'Wargear_Makeable')) ]/recipeMaker/recipeUsers/li[text()="OGI_TableMachining"]

/Defs/ThingDef[( starts-with(@Name,'OG_Imperial_') or starts-with(@Name,'OG_Militarum_') or starts-with(@Name,'OG_Mechanicus_') or starts-with(@Name,'OG_Sororitas_') or starts-with(@Name,'OG_Astartes_') or starts-with(@Name,'OG_Chaos_')) and (contains(@Name, 'Gun_Makeable') or contains(@Name, 'MeleeWeapon_Makeable')) ]/recipeMaker/recipeUsers/li[text()="OGI_TableMachining"]
